name: Pride Of The Empire (V)
Lore: 'Imperial starships that perform with distinction are highly publicized in an attempt to make the pilots look like heroes to the citizens of the Empire.',
Text: 'If you just deployed a TIE/SA, deploy on a unique TIE/SA. Bombing Run is Immune to Control. May place this card in Used Pile to take Bombing Run or ComScan Detection into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle (or, once per game, retrieve); opponent loses 1 Force. (Immune to Control.)(Original concept by Dennis Hes - PC Volunteer Award 2007)',
